text: Mazima twawa Musa ekitabo (Tawuraat) netumugoberezaako ababaka olvannyuma lwe. Era netuwa Issa mutabani wa Mariamu obubonero obwolwatu netumuwagira ne mwoyo mutukuvu (Malayika Jiburilu). Abaffe, buli lwonna omubaka wa Katonda lw'abajjira n'ebyo byemutayagala ng'olwo mwekuluntaza! Abamu ku babaka mubalimbisa ate abalala nga mubatta
